content: Hello! Thanks for contacting XYZ Home Services. What is your name so I can get started with your electrical service request?
Uh, my name is... Bill, I think. Yes, Bill.
Thank you, Bill! Can you please share your address so I can check if we can send a technician to your area?
Let me check... It’s 237 Maple Street.
Thanks, Bill. Can you tell me what date and time would work best for your electrical service?
Oh, as soon as possible. Is this going to cost a lot?

We always aim to provide competitive pricing. Once we understand the exact issue, we can give you an estimate, and there’s no obligation to continue. Let me check our calendar for the soonest availability for an electrician.
Sorry, I'm having trouble accessing our scheduling system right now. I'll get a member of our team to help finish your booking. Someone will reach out to you shortly.
reason: Agent unable to check calendar due to a system error; human assistance requested.
